name: SABnzbd
author: LoVi
help_setup: Config → General → Logging → Log Level → Debug
help_mount:
# Zu deinem SABnzbd docker-compose.yml hinzufügen:
volumes:
  - /opt/docker/sabnzbd/config:/config
  - /opt/docker/sabnzbd/config/logs:/opt/docker/logs/sabnzbd

# LoVi's docker-compose.yml bleibt unverändert:
volumes:
  - /opt/docker/logs:/logs
